name: Promoting prostitution in the first degree
text:
(1)  A person commits the offense of promoting prostitution in the first degree if the person knowingly:
    (a)   Advances prostitution by compelling a person by criminal coercion to engage in prostitution, or profits from such coercive conduct by another; or
    (b)   Advances or profits from prostitution of a person less than sixteen years old.
     (2)  Promoting prostitution in the first degree is a class B felony. [L 1972, c 9, pt of §1; am L 1993, c 130, §2]
